name: Spring of the Goddess
description:
Spring of the Goddess

Take the role of a simple gardener favored by the goddess of spring in this 2d puzzle platformer, where you will need to use giant plants to help you navigate a dangerous forest on your way to the sacred spring. 

Basic Controls:

Movement - W, A, S, D

Jump - Space

Reset Level - R

Click on a plant, then a patch of dirt to grow a seed.

Click on the shovel, then a grown plant to dig it up.

Team:

Code - benebeb

Art - Beepop

Sound/Music - urizencomposer

Design - Galactic
